trans-unit.source: Provides data for the events: <see cref="E:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeInstall" />, <see cref="E:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterInstall" />, <see cref="E:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Committing" />, <see cref="E:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Committed" />, <see cref="E:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeRollback" />, <see cref="E:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterRollback" />, <see cref="E:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeUninstall" />, <see cref="E:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterUninstall" />.
trans-unit.target: Proporciona datos para los eventos: <see cref="E:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeInstall" />, <see cref="E:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterInstall" />, <see cref="E:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Committing" />, <see cref="E:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Committed" />, <see cref="E:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeRollback" />, <see cref="E:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterRollback" />, <see cref="E:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeUninstall" /> y <see cref="E:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterUninstall" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs> contains an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> that holds information about the current state of the installation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs> contiene un <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> que contiene información sobre el estado actual de la instalación.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeInstall>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterInstall>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Committing>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Committed>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeRollback>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterRollback>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeUninstall>, and <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterUninstall> event handlers use this information.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeInstall>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterInstall>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Committing>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Committed>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeRollback>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterRollback>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeUninstall>, y <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterUninstall> controladores de eventos utilizan esta información.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructors and the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.SavedState%2A> property of the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra la <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructores y el <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.SavedState%2A> propiedad de la <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs> clase.

trans-unit.source: There are two new events called `BeforeCommit` and `AfterCommit`.
trans-unit.target: Hay dos nuevos eventos denominados `BeforeCommit` y `AfterCommit`.

trans-unit.source: The handlers of these events are invoked from the protected methods named `OnBeforeCommit` and `OnAfterCommit` respectively.
trans-unit.target: Los controladores de estos eventos se invocan desde los métodos protegidos denominados `OnBeforeCommit` y `OnAfterCommit` respectivamente.

trans-unit.source: These events are raised when the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Estos eventos se producen cuando el <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A> se llama al método.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs" /> class, and leaves the <see cref="P:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.SavedState" /> property empty.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs" /> y deja vacía la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.SavedState" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructors and the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.SavedState%2A> property of the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra la <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructores y el <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.SavedState%2A> propiedad de la <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs> clase.

trans-unit.source: There are two new events called `BeforeCommit` and `AfterCommit`.
trans-unit.target: Hay dos nuevos eventos denominados `BeforeCommit` y `AfterCommit`.

trans-unit.source: The handlers of these events are invoked from the protected methods named `OnBeforeCommit` and `OnAfterCommit` respectively.
trans-unit.target: Los controladores de estos eventos se invocan desde los métodos protegidos denominados `OnBeforeCommit` y `OnAfterCommit` respectivamente.

trans-unit.source: These events are raised when the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Estos eventos se producen cuando el <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A> se llama al método.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> that represents the current state of the installation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> que representa el estado actual de la instalación.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs" /> class, and specifies the value for the <see cref="P:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.SavedState" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs" /> y especifica el valor de la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.SavedState" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructors and the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.SavedState%2A> property of the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra la <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructores y el <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.SavedState%2A> propiedad de la <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs> clase.

trans-unit.source: There are two new events called `BeforeCommit` and `AfterCommit`.
trans-unit.target: Hay dos nuevos eventos denominados `BeforeCommit` y `AfterCommit`.

trans-unit.source: The handlers of these events are invoked from the protected methods named `OnBeforeCommit` and `OnAfterCommit` respectively.
trans-unit.target: Los controladores de estos eventos se invocan desde los métodos protegidos denominados `OnBeforeCommit` y `OnAfterCommit` respectivamente.

trans-unit.source: These events are raised when the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Estos eventos se producen cuando el <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A> se llama al método.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> that represents the current state of the installation.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un objeto <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> que representa el estado actual de la instalación.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> that represents the current state of the installation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> que representa el estado actual de la instalación.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructors and the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.SavedState%2A> property of the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra la <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructores y el <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.SavedState%2A> propiedad de la <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs> clase.

trans-unit.source: There are two new events called `BeforeCommit` and `AfterCommit`.
trans-unit.target: Hay dos nuevos eventos denominados `BeforeCommit` y `AfterCommit`.

trans-unit.source: The handlers of these events are invoked from the protected methods named `OnBeforeCommit` and `OnAfterCommit` respectively.
trans-unit.target: Los controladores de estos eventos se invocan desde los métodos protegidos denominados `OnBeforeCommit` y `OnAfterCommit` respectivamente.

trans-unit.source: These events are raised when the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Estos eventos se producen cuando el <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A> se llama al método.
